General.Name: Cortus Metals Inc
General.Description: Cortus Metals Inc. engages in the evaluation, exploration, and production of mineral properties. The company explores for gold deposits. It holds an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Grayson, Powerline, and Goldrun properties located in Nevada. Cortus Metals Inc. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Edmonton, Canada.
General.Address: 10545 - 45 Avenue NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6H 4M9
